name: Hold On (SamuelKelly)
description:
Hold on is an arena shooter with 24 stages made by Sam Kelly in the Godot game engine

Controls:

Aiming: Up, Down, Left, Right Arrows

Movement: WASD

You must survive for 30 seconds to beat a stage.  You can buy upgrades at the end of every round with money you earn from being alive. There are three enemy types: A normal fairly fast medium damaging enemy, A fat, slow, hard hitting and tanky enemy and a low damaging enemy that shoots bullets at you.

Please give feedback on difficulty as its a bit tricky to test.
